entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Brampton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:55 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 5:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -15.4°C
Wind: WSW 58 km/h gust 77 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning early this evening. Risk of snow squalls this evening and overnight. Blowing snow early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
